overview:
Paul Stallard is a seasoned PR professional and board director of Berkeley PR.

He is at the forefront of helping brands such as Iron Mountain, Kaspersky Lab, NETGEAR, Hitachi, Skillsoft and GoApe manage their reputation with world class campaigns in traditional, online and social media.

Responsible for quality control, business development, recruitment, personnel development and the day to day running of the business. A regular commentator on all things PR via the Berkeley PR blog and a variety of different media he has a passion for anything related to digital communication techniques and how clients can get the most out of these media.

“There are now so many different ways for companies to communicate with their audience. From paper-based titles, websites and blogs, to a business’ own blog and social networking presence, making sure the right message is presented is vital. We help our clients to make sure they are getting the most out of the media.”

Paul Stallard is married to a wonderful wife and is a proud Dad to a beautiful daughter. He is also a passionate match going supporter of United so don’t get him started on anything football related.

Specialties

PR, AR, marketing, comms, digital, social media, blogging - please see the Paul Stallard PR blog, corporate reputation management
